section.name: Welcome to gwt-maven
section.p: gwt-maven is a Google Web Toolkit plugin for Maven.

dl.dt: Incude the totsp mavenrepo in the maven.repo.remote location in your Maven project.
Make sure the plugin is present and have a look around at the goals

dd.pre:
maven -P gwt __ __ | \/ |__ _Apache__ ___ | |\/| / _` \ V / -_) ' \ ~ intelligent projects ~ |_| |_\__,_|\_/\___|_||_| v. 1.0.2
Goals in gwt ============
[gwt] Runs GWTShell compile ........................ Runs GWTCompiler debug .......................... Runs GWTShell debug mergewebxml .................... Merges servlets in module definitions with the project target web.xml file. war ............................ Creates deployable GWT war file (including merging GWT module with target web.xml and compiling with GWTCompiler)
